TCP/IP Tutorial and Technical Overview

5.14 AIX/ESA Connections

AIX/ESA provides support for the following connections:

  • Channel-to-channel (CTC) using:
    • ESCON channels
    • 3088 Channel-to-Channel Adapter
    • S/370 CTC Adapter
  • LAN connections using:
    • 8232 LAN Channel Station (token-ring, IEEE 802.3 and Ethernet V2)
    • 3172 Interconnect Controller Model 1 or 3 (token-ring, IEEE 802.3 and Ethernet V2, FDDI)
    • 3172 Interconnect Controller Model 2 (FDDI)
  • HYPERchannel connection:
    • NSC HYPERchannel-DX devices (for example FDDI, Ethernet, T1, T3, and RISC System/6000 via the IBM Serial Optical Channel Converter)
  • RISC System/6000 connections using:
    • Block multiplexer channel adapter (CLAW)
    • ESCON Control Unit Adapter (CLAW)
